good
I didn't realize they were here for a
funeral it sure didn't seem that way
after all the drinking and joking it
must be a small event for this we visit
but I was caught in the middle of it all
five minutes later the body was brought
in by loud honking horns things changed
immediately what's happening right now
yeah a van which is coming here they
wanted to pick up the coffin and they
put you in this house i sat there in

of the weeping men and women behind the
soft melodies of the choir
[Music]
out of respect to the family of the
young girl I turned off my camera when
the ceremony started just observed it
with my eyes and ears I was not
expecting to spend this morning
attending a funeral but I did and it was
a wake-up call that life is short every
second somewhere in the world a person
is born and a person dies it's the only
thing that's guaranteed in life today
was humbling and I will never forget
what I just witnessed in mikuni I'm Drew
Pinsky and if you like my videos please
